title: Baked sweet potato with roasted vegetables and bulgur wheat
description: Baked sweet potato makes a nice change and is a really easy, healthy dinner to throw together. To serve two,  just double up the ingredients with some bonus leftover topping for lunch.
ingredients: 1 medium sweet potato (about 350g/12oz), washed and dried
½ red pepper, cut into 2cm/¾in cubes
½ red onion, cut into wedges
salt and freshly ground black pepper
